These measures would be mandatory and forever.

This seems like an obvious way for churches to distinguish themselves and attract lots of elderly members.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why haven’t some churches specialized in strong Covid measures?

stories.text:
The Kinect got open source drivers written in weeks after release. It’s been 6 months since the Facebook Stories by Rayban debuted. There was a bounty for Kinect drivers to get written. Maybe the same needs to be done for the Facebook glasses.

I want to save videos to my computer, post to YouTube as stereo video & watch on Oculus in 3D. It would also be nice to be able to record more than 30 seconds of video.

https://www.ray-ban.com/usa/discover-ray-ban-stories/clp

Help!?
stories.title: Why haven’t Facebook/Rayban sunglasses been “hacked” to get open drivers yet?
